pkgmetadata.longdescription: Stochastic Correlation Modelling via Circular Diffusion // Performs simulation and inference of diffusion processes on circle. Stochastic correlation models based on circular diffusion models are provided. For details see Majumdar, S. and Laha, A.K. (2024) "Diffusion on the circle and a stochastic correlation model" doi:10.48550/arXiv.2412.06343.
